sandbox_0_egg.Buff2: Ingredient commonly found in the wild.

sandbox_0_horn.Buff2: Rare ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting rare animals.

sandbox_0_crab.Buff2: Ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting.

sandbox_0_venison.Buff2: Ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting.

sandbox_0_beef.Buff2: Ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting.

sandbox_0_supermeat.Name: Marrow Fungus
sandbox_0_supermeat.Buff2: Rare ingredient that has a chance to drop when hunting rare animals.

sandbox_0_building_1.Name: Portable Planting Trough
sandbox_0_building_1.Effect: Effect when placed: Produces <Rice> daily (up to 12 constructs of the same type can be deployed).

sandbox_0_building_2.Name: Mint I
sandbox_0_building_2.Effect: Effect when placed: Allows you to combine <Fresh Water> and <Iron Ore> into <Crude Gold> (up to 1 construct of the same type can be deployed).

sandbox_0_building_3.Name: Mint II
sandbox_0_building_3.Effect: Effect when placed: Allows you to combine <Fresh Water> and <Iron Ore> into more <Crude Gold> (up to 1 construct of the same type can be deployed).

sandbox_0_building_4.Name: Mint III
sandbox_0_building_4.Effect: Effect when placed: Allows you to combine <Fresh Water> and <Iron Ore> into even more <Crude Gold> (up to 1 construct of the same type can be deployed).

sandbox_0_building_5.Name: Monitoring Tower I
sandbox_0_building_5.Effect: Effect when placed: Offers visibility in an area.

sandbox_0_building_6.Name: Monitoring Tower II
sandbox_0_building_6.Effect: Effect when placed: Offers visibility in an area. Range increased, reinforced, and gains Camouflage.

sandbox_0_building_7.Name: Monitoring Tower III
sandbox_0_building_7.Effect: Effect when placed: Offers visibility in an area. Range further increased, heavily-reinforced, and gains Camouflage.

sandbox_0_building_8.Name: Urban Style Barrier I
sandbox_0_building_8.Effect: Effect when placed: Blocks the enemy's path, forcing them to go around it.

sandbox_0_building_9.Name: Urban Style Barrier II
sandbox_0_building_9.Effect: Effect when placed: Blocks the enemy's path, forcing them to go around it. Reinforced and gains Camouflage.

sandbox_0_building_10.Name: Firm Platform I
sandbox_0_building_10.Effect: Effect when placed: Fortification that ranged Operators can be deployed on.

sandbox_0_building_11.Name: Firm Platform II
sandbox_0_building_11.Effect: Effect when placed: Reinforced fortification that ranged Operators can be deployed on.

sandbox_0_building_12.Name: Firm Platform III
sandbox_0_building_12.Effect: Effect when placed: Heavily-reinforced fortification that ranged Operators can be deployed on.

sandbox_0_building_13.Name: Fortification I
sandbox_0_building_13.Effect: Effect when placed: Blocks the enemy, but does not change their path.

sandbox_0_building_14.Name: Fortification II
sandbox_0_building_14.Effect: Effect when placed: Blocks the enemy, but does not change their path. Reinforced.

sandbox_0_building_17.Name: Trap Net Launcher I
sandbox_0_building_17.Effect: Effect when placed: Fires a net at the enemy in front, temporarily binding them.

sandbox_0_building_18.Name: Trap Net Launcher II
sandbox_0_building_18.Effect: Effect when placed: Fires a net at the enemy in front, temporarily binding them for a longer period.

sandbox_0_building_19.Name: Gas Jet Thrower I
sandbox_0_building_19.Effect: Effect when placed: Pushes away the enemy in front.
sandbox_0_building_19.UnlockDesc: Unlock [Road of Prosperity] - [Formula - Gas Jet Thrower]

sandbox_0_building_20.Name: Gas Jet Thrower II
sandbox_0_building_20.Effect: Effect when placed: Pushes away the enemy in front with greater frequency.

sandbox_0_building_21.Name: Transregional Communication Station I
sandbox_0_building_21.Effect: Effect when placed: Unlocks Transregional communication after day 9 of each round (up to 1 construct of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_21.UnlockDesc: Unlock [Road of Prosperity] - [Formula - Transregional Communication Station]

sandbox_0_building_22.Name: Transregional Communication Station II
sandbox_0_building_22.Effect: Effect when placed: Unlocks Transregional communication after day 6 of each round (up to 1 construct of the same type can be deployed).

sandbox_0_building_23.Name: Resource Planning Station I
sandbox_0_building_23.Effect: Effect when placed: Gives an extra deployment slot each battle (up to 3 constructs of the same type can be deployed).

sandbox_0_building_24.Name: Resource Planning Station II
sandbox_0_building_24.Effect: Effect when placed: Gives 2 extra deployment slots each battle (up to 3 constructs of the same type can be deployed).

sandbox_0_building_25.Name: Combat Readiness Station I
sandbox_0_building_25.Effect: Effect when placed: Gives 2 Life Points each battle (up to 5 constructs of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_25.UnlockDesc: Unlock [Road of Prosperity] - [Formula - Combat Readiness Station]

sandbox_0_building_26.Name: Combat Readiness Station II
sandbox_0_building_26.Effect: Effect when placed: Gives 3 Life Points each battle (up to 5 constructs of the same type can be deployed).

sandbox_0_building_27.Name: Modular Computing Station
sandbox_0_building_27.Effect: Effect when placed: Gives extra Construction Points at the end of the round (up to 4 constructs of the same type can be deployed).
sandbox_0_building_27.UnlockDesc: Unlock [Road of Prosperity] - [Formula - Modular Computing Station]

sandbox_0_tactical_1.Name: Wasteland Cache: Support Fog Machine
sandbox_0_tactical_1.Effect: Effect when used: Slows the Movement Speed of nearby enemies.

sandbox_0_tactical_2.Name: Wasteland Cache: Support Coil
sandbox_0_tactical_2.Effect: Effect when used: When linked to other Support Coils, deals Arts damage by shocking passing enemies, and slows them.

sandbox_0_tactical_3.Name: Wasteland Cache: Support Landmine Set
sandbox_0_tactical_3.Effect: Effect when used: When activated, explodes when an enemy passes by, dealing True Damage to all nearby enemies, and temporarily increasing damage that they take.

sandbox_0_tactical_4.Name: Wasteland Cache: Support Gas Tanks
sandbox_0_tactical_4.Effect: Effect when used: Pushes away nearby enemies with greater force.

sandbox_0_tactical_5.Name: Wasteland Cache: Support Originium Bomb
sandbox_0_tactical_5.Effect: Effect when used: Explodes to deal heavy True Damage to all enemies within range.

sandbox_0_tactical_6.Name: Wasteland Cache: Hypnotic Censer
sandbox_0_tactical_6.Effect: Effect when used: Temporarily inflicts Sleep on enemies in the 8 surrounding tiles. Special effect on animals.

sandbox_0_tactical_7.Name: Wasteland Cache: Support Mr. Boom
sandbox_0_tactical_7.Effect: Effect when used: Temporarily stuns nearby enemies.

sandbox_0_tactical_8.Name: Wasteland Cache: Camouflage Device
sandbox_0_tactical_8.Effect: Effect when used: Can be deployed on high and low ground. Grants Camouflage to all allies in the 8 surrounding tiles.

sandbox_0_tactical_9.Name: Wasteland Cache: Refreshing Potion
sandbox_0_tactical_9.Effect: Effect when used: Increases the ASPD of the Operator in front, and forces them to retreat when the effect expires (partial DP refund).

sandbox_0_tactical_10.Name: Wasteland Cache: Support First-aid Kit
sandbox_0_tactical_10.Effect: Effect when used: Restores a large amount of HP to an ally within range.

sandbox_0_tactical_11.Name: Wasteland Cache: Support Replenishment Station
sandbox_0_tactical_11.Effect: Effect when used: Periodically restores SP to an ally.
sandbox_0_tactical_11.UnlockDesc: Unlock [Road of Prosperity] - [Formula - Wasteland Cache: Support Replenishment Station]

sandbox_0_tactical_12.Name: Wasteland Cache: Support Escape Crane
sandbox_0_tactical_12.Effect: Effect when used: Immediately causes the Operator in front to retreat, with greatly reduced Redeployment Time.
sandbox_0_tactical_12.UnlockDesc: Unlock [Road of Prosperity] - [Formula - Wasteland Cache: Support Escape Crane]

sandbox_0_tactical_13.Name: Wasteland Cache: Remote Shield Generator
sandbox_0_tactical_13.Effect: Effect when used: Periodically provides Barrier for an ally.

sandbox_0_tactical_14.Name: Emergency Repair Vehicle
sandbox_0_tactical_14.Effect: Effect when used: Can be deployed on high and low ground. Restores the HP of the construct in front every second.
sandbox_0_tactical_14.UnlockDesc: Unlock [Road of Prosperity] - [Formula - Emergency Repair Vehicle]

sandbox_0_tactical_15.Name: Crabbie Pumpie
sandbox_0_tactical_15.Effect: Effect when used: Allows <Fresh Water> to be gathered from <Clear Water>.

sandbox_0_tactical_16.Name: Basic Gathering Hub
sandbox_0_tactical_16.Effect: Effect when used: Produces <Gatherers> to gather from <Thickets>, <Monoliths>, and <Strange Ore Veins>, with a bonus when gathering from <Thickets>. Limit of 3.

sandbox_0_tactical_17.Name: Advanced Gathering Hub
sandbox_0_tactical_17.Effect: Effect when used: Produces <Gatherers> to gather from <Thickets>, <Monoliths>, and <Strange Ore Veins>, with a bonus when gathering from <Monolith>. Limit of 3.

sandbox_0_tactical_18.Name: Executive Gathering Hub
sandbox_0_tactical_18.Effect: Effect when used: Produces <Gatherers> to gather from <Thickets>, <Monoliths>, and <Strange Ore Veins>, with a bonus when gathering from <Strange Ore Veins>. Limit of 4.

sandbox_0_tactical_19.Name: Wasteland Cache: Custom Floating Platform
sandbox_0_tactical_19.Effect: Effect when used: Constructs a platform on the water upon which any unit can be deployed.

sandbox_0_gold.Name: Crude Gold
sandbox_0_gold.Effect: Unprocessed Pure Gold, low in value or circulation.

weather_thunder_storm.Name: Thunderstorm
weather_thunder_storm.Function: Lightning strikes 3 random tiles (range can overlap) every 15 seconds, dealing 1300 True damage to units on those tiles in an area

weather_thunder.Name: Thunderburst
weather_thunder.Function: Lightning strikes 3 random tiles (range can overlap) every 30 seconds, dealing 1000 True damage to units on those tiles in an area

weather_acid_rain.Name: Acid Rain
weather_acid_rain.Function: Deals 20 Corrosion Damage to all Operators every second

weather_heat_wave.Name: Scorching Sun
weather_heat_wave.Function: Every 20 seconds, the Operator with the lowest Max HP is afflicted with [Burn](does not stack), receiving 150 Arts damage per second for 10 seconds, and upon subsiding spreads the effect to any nearby Operators in adjacent tiles

weather_heat.Name: Bright Sun
weather_heat.Function: Every 20 seconds, the Operator with the lowest Max HP is afflicted with [Burn](does not stack), receiving 75 Arts damage per second for 10 seconds, and upon subsiding spreads the effect to any nearby Operators in adjacent tiles

weather_hot.Name: Hot Weather
weather_hot.Function: Operators are stunned for 10 Seconds every 50 Seconds

weather_big_sandstorm.Name: Habūb
weather_big_sandstorm.Function: A sandstorm starts blowing in a random direction when the mission begins, and allied units caught in the sandstorm will have their ATK -50%. Facilities and other Operators can block the sandstorm to negate the effects.

weather_sandstorm.Name: Sandstorm
weather_sandstorm.Function: A sandstorm starts blowing in a random direction when the mission begins, and allied units caught in the sandstorm will have their ATK -35%. Facilities and other Operators can block the sandstorm to negate the effects.
